dpm.content.advertisement
Class DesignEntityAdv

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.document.Advertisement
      dpm.content.advertisement.DesignEntityAdv
Direct Known Subclasses:
DesignEntityRelatedAdv, ProductAdvertisement, TaskAdvertisement
public class DesignEntityAdv
extends net.jxta.document.Advertisement

Once a task attains a certain state, this is advertised using a TaskDoBeforeAdvertisement
